phokimo.src.rate_constants

A library to store a variety of rate constants.

Classes

A theory for the computation of relaxtion rates.

A theory for the computation of emission rates.

A theory for the computation of reaction rates.

Interface to define the varying theories that should be used for the computation of the rates.

class phokimo.src.rate_constants.RelaxationTheory

This is an abstract class for the declaration of common operations for the relaxation theories.

Instantiate the relaxation theory object.

abstract compute_rate(dE: float, n_modes: float, n_atoms: float, T: float = 298.15) → float

Abstract method for a relaxtion rate.

Parameters:

  • dE (float) – Energy difference

  • n_modes (float) – number of involved normal modes

  • n_atoms (float) – number of atoms

  • T (float, optional) – temperature. Defaults to 298.15.

Returns:

_description_

Return type:

float

abstract compute_rate(nu: float, f12: float, g1: float = 1, g2: float = 1) → float

Abstract method for the computation of emission rates.

Parameters:

  • nu (float) – wave length (nm)

  • f12 (float) – oscillator strength (-)

  • g1 (float, optional) – degeneracy state 1. Defaults to 1.

  • g2 (float, optional) – degeneracy state 2. Defaults to 1.

Returns:

rate

Return type:

float

class phokimo.src.rate_constants.EyringEquation

A theory for the computation of reaction rates.

compute_rate(dG: float, T: float = 298.15, kappa: float = 1) → float

Compute the rate constant using the Eyring equation.

Eyring: https://doi.org/10.1039/TF9353100875

Eyring and Polyani: https://doi.org/10.1063/1.1749604

\[k = \kappa \cdot \dfrac{k_\mathrm{b}T}{h}\exp-\dfrac{\Delta G}{RT}\]
Parameters:

  • dG (float) – Gibbs energy of activation in J/mol

  • T (float, optional) – Temperature. Defaults to 298.15.

  • kappa (float, optional) – transimission coefficient. Defaults to 1.

Returns:

Eyring eq. derived rate constant

Return type:

float

class phokimo.src.rate_constants.EinsteinCoeffientA12

A theory for the computation of emission rates.

compute_rate(nu: float, f12: float, g1: float = 1, g2: float = 1) → float

Rate constant for spontaneous emission derived by Einstein coeffs.

Equation from Table I: https://doi.org/10.1119/1.12937

Original work: A. Einstein, Zur Quantentheorie der Strahlung,

Physikalische Zeitschrift, 1917 ,18, 121.

\[A_{21} = \dfrac{g_1}{g_2} \cdot \dfrac{\pi \nu e^2 }{\epsilon_0 m_\mathrm{el}}\]
Parameters:

  • nu (float) – Excitation energy in nm

  • f12 (float) – Oscillator strength

  • g1 (float, optional) – Degeneracy factor. Defaults to 1.

  • g2 (float, optional) – Degeneracy factor. Defaults to 1.

Returns:

Spontaneous emission coefficient

Return type:

float

class phokimo.src.rate_constants.AdhocRelaxation

A theory for the computation of relaxtion rates.

compute_rate(dE: float, n_modes: float, n_atoms: float, T: float = 298.15) → float

Ad hoc ansatz for the approximation of the relaxation of structure to the ground state.

This is a self developed approach for the description of the relaxation of vibronically excited states. It is based on the Eyring equation and considers # that a relaxation occurs through a relaxation of the normal mode. It depends on the excess energy between the ground state and its initial state.

\[k_\mathrm{relax} = \dfrac{k_\mathrm{B}T}{h} \exp\dfrac{-n\Delta\epsilon_\mathrm{init}^\mathrm{final}}{RT}\]
Parameters:

  • dE (float) – Energy difference between excited and ground structure in J/mol.

  • n_modes (float) – Number of normal modes involved in the relaxation.

  • T (float) – Temperature. Defaults to 298.15.

  • n_atoms (float) – Number of atoms of the structure

Returns:

Rate of relaxation.

Return type:

float

class phokimo.src.rate_constants.RateCalculator(reaction_theory: ~phokimo.src.rate_constants.ReactionTheory = <phokimo.src.rate_constants.EyringEquation object>, emission_theory: ~phokimo.src.rate_constants.EmissionTheory = <phokimo.src.rate_constants.EinsteinCoeffientA12 object>, relaxation_theory: ~phokimo.src.rate_constants.RelaxationTheory = <phokimo.src.rate_constants.AdhocRelaxation object>)

Interface to define the varying theories that should be used for the computation of the rates.

__init__(reaction_theory: ~phokimo.src.rate_constants.ReactionTheory = <phokimo.src.rate_constants.EyringEquation object>, emission_theory: ~phokimo.src.rate_constants.EmissionTheory = <phokimo.src.rate_constants.EinsteinCoeffientA12 object>, relaxation_theory: ~phokimo.src.rate_constants.RelaxationTheory = <phokimo.src.rate_constants.AdhocRelaxation object>) → None

Sets the default theories for the computation of the rate constants of different systems.

Parameters:

  • reaction_theory (ReactionTheory, optional) – Theory for Reactions. Defaults to EyringEquation().

  • emission_theory (EmissionTheory, optional) – Theory for Emission. Defaults to EinsteinCoeffientA12().

  • relaxation_theory (RelaxationTheory, optional) – Theory for Relaxation. Defaults to AdhocRelaxation().

property reaction_theory: ReactionTheory

Property attribute of the reaction theory in the rate calculator.

Returns:

reaction theory

Return type:

ReactionTheory

property emission_theory: EmissionTheory

Property attribute of the emission theory in the rate calculator.

Returns:

emission theory

Return type:

EmissionTheory

property relaxation_theory: RelaxationTheory

Property attribute of the relaxation theory in the rate calculator.

Returns:

relaxation theory

Return type:

RelaxationTheory
